enhanced_description: Policy Bazaar, established in 2008, operates as India's premier online insurance marketplace, focused on bringing transparency to the insurance sector. It enables over 9 million individuals to compare and purchase optimal insurance plans from a network of more than 50 top insurers. With over 19 million policies sold, Policy Bazaar provides an online platform that facilitates quick, informed insurance decisions and a seamless application process, often offering higher coverage at lower premiums compared to traditional offline methods. The platform also includes integrated claims support, aiming to build a health and financial safety net for more households in India and to improve employee happiness and engagement through total rewards offerings.
